title: Anvil
description: Rust-based package manager for VFX pipelines. Think Rez, but faster. YAML package definitions, dependency resolution, and DCC launcher for Maya, Houdini, Blender, Nuke with environment setup.

title: OpenGrid
description: Lightweight production tracking tool â€” a simpler alternative to ShotGrid. Python SDK, FastAPI REST API, and React dashboard. Track assets, shots, tasks, and versions.

title: USD Asset Resolver
description: USD AR2 resolver with a Rust core and Python bindings via PyO3. URI parsing, LRU caching with mtime invalidation, SQLite backend, version resolution, and a PySide6 asset browser.

title: USD Lint
description: Linter for OpenUSD .usda files. Rust-based PEG parser with 10 built-in rules for naming, hierarchy, and composition validation. Outputs to terminal, JSON, or GitHub Actions format.

title: Rosewood UI
description: Personal design system with CSS components, React wrappers, and PySide6/Qt components for DCC tool GUIs. Dark-first design for both web apps and desktop pipeline tools.
